Hi Hagop, 

 

 

I hope this message finds you well.

I’m reaching out to provide you an insight about Gifts and Graphics, a dynamic brand under JCRM Sosho Enterprise FZC, proudly based in the UAE. We specialize in creative corporate gifting, promotional merchandise, and custom branding and advertising solutions tailored to elevate your brand’s presence and leave a lasting impression

At Gifts and Graphics, we combine innovation, quality, and style to deliver items that not only represent your brand but also connect with your audience. Whether you're looking for branded giveaways, executive gifts, customized packaging, or event-based promotional items – we’ve got you covered.

 

Our Key Services Include:

chunks.text:
At Gifts and Graphics, we combine innovation, quality, and style to deliver items that not only represent your brand but also connect with your audience. Whether you're looking for branded giveaways, executive gifts, customized packaging, or event-based promotional items – we’ve got you covered.

 

Our Key Services Include:

 

*	Customized Corporate Gifts, Promotional Items & Merch for Events & Exhibitions
*	Branding & Printing/ Embroidery ( T-shirts / Caps / Aprons/ Staff Uniforms )
*	Event & Promotional Products (Event Kits, Corporate Event Giveaways)
*	Design & Packaging Solutions (Design services for logos, brochures, banners, sign boards and gift item customization
*	Custom Projects and Advertising Solutions

We’d love the opportunity to collaborate with you and discuss how we can support your marketing, client appreciation, or employee engagement initiatives.

Please feel free to reply to this email or reach out directly at 050-541-5276 (JCRM). 

Thank you for your time, and we look forward to working with you.

 

Thank you,
